metadata.name: enginesRises, inna 鬼鎮 (Ghosttown) Spirit Simulator
metadata.description:
Instability glitches the grounds, on stolenLands, into a sunsrise. From the Glitch Western whirlds of the 鬼鎮 (Ghosttown) Spirit Simulator Glitch Art Game environment. 
50% of primary sales goes to Indigenous-led concerns.
